title: The Professor at the Breakfast Table Heathen Image

content.question: In the first sentence of the fourth paragraph, the narrator’s straightforward explanation of the “heathen images” running through the divinity-student’s mind serves to

choices.label: indicate the kinds of materials that the divinity-student has been reading
address a potential misunderstanding of the divinity-student’s reaction
describe the divinity-student’s childish response to the Poor Relation's remark
emphasize the divinity-student’s focus on practical rather than spiritual matters

content.answer: address a potential misunderstanding of the divinity-student’s reaction

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain how a narrator's reliability affects a narrative.
